20000017.name: "Ahhh, those tiny claws!"

20000018.description: As Black Widow, land 3 KOs with critical hits in a single match.

20000004.description: As Loki, land one KO by stabbing from behind.

20000020.description: As Venom, snare 4 enemies with a single use of Cellular Corrosion.

20000067.name: Hot & Trending

20000008.name: Justice for All!
20000008.description: As Captain America, land 3 KOs with a single use of Freedom Charge.

20000012.description: As Black Panther, land a 3-player KO streak in the Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda: Hall of Djalia.

20000071.description: As Invisible Woman, assist the Fantastic Four members 10 times.

20000033.name: Might of Fuxi

20000016.description: As Luna Snow, complete a match on 5 maps with different themes.

20000075.name: No More Strings

20000023.description: As Scarlet Witch, take down Mutant enemies 10 times.

20000079.name: Old Haunts
20000079.description: As Blade, land a 3-player KO streak in Empire of Eternal Night: Central Park.

20000005.description: As Doctor Strange, land 1 terrain KO with the portal.

20000015.name: Punishment of the Moon
20000015.description: As Moon Knight, hit 4 enemies with a single use of Hand of Khonshu.

20000032.name: Rage Uncaged
20000032.description: As Wolverine, land 3 KOs with a single use of Last Stand.

20000077.name: Schism from Within
20000077.description: As Emma Frost, force mutants to move 10 times with Psionic Seduction.

20000001.name: Smart Is New Smash
20000001.description: As Bruce Banner, land 1 KO within 3 seconds of calming down from the Hulk to Banner.
